docs.description: An overview and guide to using the IndexedDB API for client-side storage of significant amounts of structured data.
An overview of databases, explaining their purpose, types, and fundamental concepts.
The Node.js File System (fs) module documentation provides comprehensive details on file and directory operations in Node.js.

notes.description: An in-depth guide on Database Management Systems (DBMS), covering concepts, architecture, and various database models.
Comprehensive resource covering fundamental concepts and components of Database Management Systems (DBMS).
An introductory guide to MySQL and relational database management systems (RDBMS).
An introductory guide to understanding database management systems (DBMS) and SQL fundamentals.
An introductory guide to understanding the basics and components of Database Management Systems (DBMS).

quiz.question: Which of the following is a primary feature of relational databases?
quiz.hint: Relational databases organize data into rows and columns.

quiz.question: What is the main purpose of normalization in database design?
quiz.hint: Normalization aims to eliminate data anomalies by organizing data efficiently.

quiz.question: Which SQL statement is used to ensure that a transaction is saved to the database?
quiz.hint: This command is used to make the changes made by a transaction permanent.

quiz.question: Which of the following is a key characteristic of NoSQL databases?
quiz.hint: NoSQL databases are known for their ability to handle large-scale data across distributed systems.

quiz.question: Which technology is most commonly associated with relational databases?
quiz.hint: This is an open-source relational database management system.
